title: What is the difference between the admission system in Kendriya Vidyalaya and in Jawahar Navodaya Vidyalaya? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hi Hope you are doing well For getting into JNV you need to give an entrance test for class 6th or for 9th class. Without entrance there is no admission in JNV. The candidates who wish to get Navodaya Vidyalaya Admission 2021-22 can fill the Navodaya Form 2021 form. The application form will be made available through an online medium. The candidates can get admission for class 6th and 9th. The interested candidate needs to submit the application form before the last date for submitting the form. Procedure to Apply for JNV Admission 2021: Visit the official website of Navodaya VidyalayaClick on the direct link available to the Navodaya Form 2021.Fill the details of the JNV Admission 2021 Application Form.Upload the documents asked in the application form.Recheck the details and submit.Make the payment.Take out the print out of the application form and keep it for future use.In KV you can take admission if you are the child of a staff working in central or state govt. There are various quotas for admission in KV like only girl child, Paramilitary forces, armed forces etc. The forms are available in school and there is no entrance test for KVs. Hope this information was useful. Thanks and Regards

Well in kendriya vidyalaya is for children of central government or state government staff.But there are possibility of admission of other children whose parent are not central or government staff. In case of admission in JNV the candidate must appear for jnvst which stands for jawahar navoday vidyalaya selection test and that canditate must be studying in class 6 when he/she is appearing for the test. And when he/she clears the test then other procedures can be taken accordingly. And there is also a way for getting admission in class 9 and 11 against vacant seats if there's any which is known as lateral entry. For admission in class 9 again the canditate must appear for a test. As for class 11 the decision will be made based on his/her class 10 result.And after that interview will be held. I hope this is a satisfied answer.
